query.name: us.al.k12.dothan.franklin.students
query.description: Pulls student data for MCS Franklin
query.sql: WITH current_year as ( /* -- Define the year with the largest student count -- as the current school year */ select yearid from ( select t.yearid as yearid, count(s.dcid) as cnt from students s join terms t on t.schoolid = s.schoolid and s.schoolid not in (888888,999999) and t.yearid >= 30 and t.isyearrec = 1 and s.entrydate between t.firstday and t.lastday group by t.yearid order by count(s.dcid) desc ) where rownum = 1 ), active_students as ( /* -- Pull the most current enrollment from the PowerSchool STUDENTS table -- for students enrolled in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, STU.ID FROM STUDENTS STU where stu.student_number is not null and stu.entrydate < stu.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where stu.entrydate <= terms.lastday and stu.exitdate > terms.firstday and stu.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) union /* -- Pull all prior enrollment records from the PowerSchool REENROLLMENTS table -- for students who had multiple enrollments in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, ENR.STUDENTID FROM REENROLLMENTS ENR inner join students stu on enr.studentid = stu.id and stu.student_number is not null where enr.entrydate < enr.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where enr.entrydate <= terms.lastday and enr.exitdate > terms.firstday and enr.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) ) SELECT s.student_number as "Student_number", s2.lunch_number as "Lunch_number", s.state_studentnumber as "State_studentnumber", ltrim(rtrim(replace(s.last_name,chr(34),chr(39)))) as "Last_name", ltrim(rtrim(replace(s.first_name,chr(34),chr(39)))) as "First_name", ltrim(rtrim(replace(s.middle_name,chr(34),chr(39)))) as "Middle_name", s3.suffix as "Suffix", case when s.grade_level < 0 then 'PK' when s.grade_level = 0 then 'KG' when s.grade_level > 12 then 'GR' else to_char(s.grade_level) end as "Grade", substr(CONCAT('00',s.schoolid),-4) as "School_id", to_char(s.dob,'MM/DD/YYYY') as "DOB", s.street as "Street", s.city as "City", s.state as "State", s.zip as "Zip", s.mailing_street as "Mailing_street", s.mailing_city as "Mailing_city", s.mailing_state as "Mailing_state", s.mailing_zip as "Mailing_zip", s.entrydate as "Entry_date", null as "Exit_date", '1' as "Active", s.ssn as "SSN", s.home_phone as "Home_phone", null as "Work_phone", null as "Head_of_household", s.ethnicity as "Race", CONCAT(substr(CONCAT('000',cc.Section_Number),-4), CONCAT(' ', u.last_name)) as "Home_room", sch.name as "School_name", null as "Language", s.gender as "Gender", null as "Guardian_email" FROM active_students stu join ( -- detect new year rollover "today" select 1 as value from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate' and to_char(to_date(value, 'mm/dd/yyyy'), 'J') <> to_char(sysdate, 'J') union select 2 as value from ( select name from prefs where not exists (select 1 from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate') ) where rownum = 1 ) on 1 = 1 inner join students s on stu.id = s.id and stu.student_number is not null left JOIN U_DEF_EXT_STUDENTS s2 ON s2.studentsdcid = s.dcid left JOIN S_STU_X s3 ON s3.StudentsDCID = s.dcid JOIN SCHOOLS sch ON sch.school_number = s.schoolid left join cc on cc.studentid = s.id and cc.course_number = '22991X00' and cc.termid = 3100 left join schoolstaff ss on ss.id = cc.teacherid left join users u on u.dcid = ss.USERS_DCID where s.state_studentnumber is not null AND s.enroll_status = 0 order by s.student_number

query.name: us.al.k12.dothan.franklin.lunchstatus
query.description: Pulls student data for MCS Franklin
query.sql: WITH current_year as ( /* -- Define the year with the largest student count -- as the current school year */ select yearid from ( select t.yearid as yearid, count(s.dcid) as cnt from students s join terms t on t.schoolid = s.schoolid and s.schoolid not in (888888,999999) and t.yearid >= 30 and t.isyearrec = 1 and s.entrydate between t.firstday and t.lastday group by t.yearid order by count(s.dcid) desc ) where rownum = 1 ), active_students as ( /* -- Pull the most current enrollment from the PowerSchool STUDENTS table -- for students enrolled in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, STU.ID FROM STUDENTS STU where stu.student_number is not null and stu.entrydate < stu.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where stu.entrydate <= terms.lastday and stu.exitdate > terms.firstday and stu.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) union /* -- Pull all prior enrollment records from the PowerSchool REENROLLMENTS table -- for students who had multiple enrollments in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, ENR.STUDENTID FROM REENROLLMENTS ENR inner join students stu on enr.studentid = stu.id and stu.student_number is not null where enr.entrydate < enr.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where enr.entrydate <= terms.lastday and enr.exitdate > terms.firstday and enr.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) ) SELECT s.state_studentnumber as "State_studentnumber", s.lunchstatus as "Lunch_status" FROM active_students stu join ( -- detect new year rollover "today" select 1 as value from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate' and to_char(to_date(value, 'mm/dd/yyyy'), 'J') <> to_char(sysdate, 'J') union select 2 as value from ( select name from prefs where not exists (select 1 from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate') ) where rownum = 1 ) on 1 = 1 inner join students s on stu.id = s.id and stu.student_number is not null order by s.student_number

query.name: us.al.k12.dothan.franklin.directcertification
query.sql:
WITH current_year as ( /* -- Define the year with the largest student count -- as the current school year */ select yearid from ( select t.yearid as yearid, count(s.dcid) as cnt from students s join terms t on t.schoolid = s.schoolid and s.schoolid not in (888888,999999) and t.yearid >= 30 and t.isyearrec = 1 and s.entrydate between t.firstday and t.lastday group by t.yearid order by count(s.dcid) desc ) where rownum = 1 ),
active_students as ( /* -- Pull the most current enrollment from the PowerSchool STUDENTS table -- for students enrolled in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, STU.ID FROM STUDENTS STU where stu.student_number is not null and stu.entrydate < stu.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where stu.entrydate <= terms.lastday and stu.exitdate > terms.firstday and stu.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) union /* -- Pull all prior enrollment records from the PowerSchool REENROLLMENTS table -- for students who had multiple enrollments in the current school year */ SELECT STU.STUDENT_NUMBER, ENR.STUDENTID FROM REENROLLMENTS ENR inner join students stu on enr.studentid = stu.id and stu.student_number is not null where enr.entrydate < enr.exitdate and exists (select 1 from terms join current_year y on y.yearid = terms.yearid and terms.isyearrec = 1 where enr.entrydate <= terms.lastday and enr.exitdate > terms.firstday and enr.schoolid = terms.schoolid ) )
SELECT s.last_name as last_name, s.first_name as first_name, s.middle_name as middle_name, to_char(s.dob, 'mmddyy') as dob, s.street as street, s.city as city, s.state as state, s.zip as zip, p.firstname as guardian_lastname, p.lastname as guardian_firstname, p.middlename as guardian_middlename, case when l.identified_population = 4 then 'SNAP' when l.identified_population = 5 then 'TANF' when l.identified_population = 6 then 'FDPIR' when l.identified_population = 7 then 'Foster' when l.identified_population = 8 then 'Extended Eligibility - SNAP' when l.identified_population = 9 then 'Extended Eligibility - TANF' when l.identified_population = 10 then 'Medicaid' when l.identified_population = 11 then 'SCHIP' when l.identified_population = 12 then 'Homeless' when l.identified_population = 13 then 'Migrant' when l.identified_population = 15 then 'DHR' when l.identified_population = 20 then 'Parent Declined Service' when l.identified_population = 99 then 'Temporary DC' else null end as indentified_population, s.State_StudentNumber as stateid_number FROM active_students stu join ( -- detect new year rollover "today" select 1 as value from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate' and to_char(to_date(value, 'mm/dd/yyyy'), 'J') <> to_char(sysdate, 'J') union select 2 as value from ( select name from prefs where not exists (select 1 from prefs where name = 'lastpromotiondate') ) where rownum = 1 ) on 1 = 1 inner join students s on stu.id = s.id and stu.student_number is not null join S_AL_STU_LUNCH_X l on s.dcid = l.StudentsDCID and l.identified_population is not null left join studentcontactassoc sca on s.dcid=sca.studentdcid and sca.CONTACTPRIORITYORDER = 1 left outer join person p on sca.personid = p.id
